001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.service;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.dao.ChannelRepository;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity.Channel;
006import java.io.InputStream;
007import java.util.Arrays;
008import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
009import org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner;
010import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
011import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
012import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
013
014@Component
015@Profile("preload")
016public class Preloader implements CommandLineRunner {
017
018  private final ChannelRepository repository;
019
020  @Autowired
021  public Preloader(ChannelRepository repository) {
022    this.repository = repository;
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public void run(String... args) throws Exception {
027    ClassPathResource channelsResource = new ClassPathResource("preload/channels.json");
028    try (InputStream input = channelsResource.getInputStream()) {
029      ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
030      Channel[] channels = mapper.readValue(input, Channel[].class);
031      repository.saveAll(Arrays.stream(channels).toList());
032    }
033  }
034
035}
